about_the_game:
The Inverse is a horror-style puzzle game. You arrive at the grand opening of a freshly built science lab, The Inverse Labs. Unfortunately though, once the opening ceremony has concluded and you start the tour, things start to go wrong. Other tour members start to go missing and strange noises can be heard... It's your job to investigate, rescue what's left and escape the lab before everybody's gone and it's too late.

Collect items, defeat creatures and rescue survivors. You must complete puzzles while fending off creatures from the FlipSide to restore segments of The Inverse Labs. Once the lab has been restored, you must DESTROY the FlipSide. For good.

Play with Friends!

The Inverse allows you to take on the lab, with your steam friends, using online or local multiplayer! Invite all your friends to your server and try to destroy the FlipSide!

Give it Your All

Try to unlock all the in-game achievements and their matching trophies. If you do, we have something special for you...
